HTML 

 <div class="code">
  <div class="code-toolbar"><p>CSS</p></div>
 <pre>
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"> 
 </pre>
 </div>

CSS 


div.code {
	width: 100%; padding: 1em auto;
}

div.code-toolbar {
	height: 2em;
	background: #222;
	border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0;
	line-height: 2;
	padding: 0 0.5em;
	text-align: right;color:white;
}

div.code pre {
	font: 1em Monaco, "Courier New", monospace;
	margin: 0 0 1em 0;
	line-height: 1.4;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
	word-wrap: break-word;
	background: #eee;
	padding: 1em;
	border-radius: 0 0 10px 10px;
}

.container-rainbow

HTML 

<div class="container-rainbow">
    <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nrPKohTWF2Y" title="Responsitranity con Jurado y Elenco Dragvesti All Stars" frameborder="0"  allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen>
    </iframe>
</div>

CSS 

  .container-rainbow {
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  .container-rainbow::after {
    content: "";
    background: linear-gradient(to right, lightblue, hotpink);
    filter: grayscale(1);
    width: 560px;
    height: 315px;
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;border-radius: 10px;
    mix-blend-mode: multiply;
    pointer-events: none;
    transition-duration: 1s;
  }
  .container-rainbow:hover::after {
    filter: grayscale(0);
    animation: rainbow 2s linear infinite;
  }

  @keyframes rainbow {
    from {
      filter: hue-rotate(0);
    }
    to {
      filter: hue-rotate(360deg);
    }
  }

  .container-rainbow iframe {border-radius: 10px;}
